articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: Sensex, Nifty rise marginally in early trade on gains in bank, financials - Economic Times
articles.description: From the Sensex pack, HDFC Bank, HDFC, Bajaj Finserv, NTPC, Wipro, and ITC opened in the red, while IndusInd Bank, HCL Tech, ICICI Bank, Sun Pharma, Asian Paints, Tata Steel and Tech Mahindra opened with gains.
articles.content: After six days of winning run, Indian equity indices opened marginally lower on Wednesday but soon erased losses amid buying in bank and financial stocks. Caution, however, prevailed on Dalal Street … [+3791 chars]
